Fuck America. Fuck America and all its bullshit.  Fuck that it portrays itself as a hero, a good guy and a beacon of moral clarity.

Fuck the Founding Fathers and their genocidal bullshit. Fuck the plantation owners and their descendants who still profit from the ill-gotten wealth.  Fuck the contractors who build the bombs that rip through Yemeni schoolbuses. Fuck the men who turn up music so nobody can hear the women scream, and fuck the white women voters who prop it all up.

annotation.label: Dehumanizing
annotation.reasoning: The text contains language that reduces people or groups to objects by using derogatory terms towards specific social groups, such as 'white women voters'.

annotation.reasoning: The text implies that the hatred towards a specific group of people (white Western Christians) is not significant or valid because they are part of a larger group (Western Christians), which can be seen as reducing the value and dignity of this group.
annotation.isOtheringReasoning: This statement implies that the hatred or dislike of one group (white Western Christians) is more significant or noteworthy than the hatred of another group (other religions or identities), thus creating an adversarial relationship between these groups.
